column2: 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient) $5$5$5$I spent 20 years looking for a drug to relieve my depression.. I tried several classes of antidepressants with no or minimal relief. I am currently taking bupropion and escitalopram with several other mood drugs. Once we added Abilify a great weight was lifted. I am able to function now
column3: which I was not able to. I love it. I have little or no side effects.

column1: 4$Condition: Additional Medications to Treat Depression$6/20/2014 2:31:19 AM$Reviewer: Becareful
column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient) $1$1$3$This medication has left its mark. Not only do the problems it was to help with still exists now there is a myriad of side effects that are very serious and debilitating. I would be afraid for anyone who is entertaining it....not sure why FDA approved this Rx . I wouldn't suggest even for someone I didn't like.

column2: 45-54 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient) $4$4$4$Ablify was added to my Zoloft approx. 2 months ago. It has been a god send as I have Major Depressive disorder re current. I am not 100% but the mood is so much better I can not tell you.
